oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial View of Capitol Hill, 1961
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of the Capitol Hill area in downtown Nashville, 8 November 1961. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
